page.title: 10 Housing Estates.
page.content: Many people in Tamworth live on housing estates. The Leyfields, Perrycrofts, Gillway, Belgrave and Glascote Heath are examples of housing estates in Tamworth. There are areas of housing in Tamworth which are centred on {old villages}, for example Glascote, Amington and Two Gates. Glascote Heath housing estate got its name because it was built on the high heathland near the {original village} of Glascote. The name Amington Heath has been given for a similar reason. Many of the new housing estates in Tamworth have been created to deal with the {influx} of people from Birmingham who have moved to the town during the last twenty years
